rows.label: qst202022_msg0001
rows.name: It's true, then. She really did go back...

rows.label: qst202022_msg0002
rows.name:
It'll have happened so suddenly...
It must have been a real shock.

rows.label: qst202022_msg0003
rows.name: We able to awaken her again?

rows.label: qst202022_msg0004
rows.name:
You'll have to wait a while first for the
color to return to how it was before.

rows.label: qst202022_msg0005
rows.name:
But...that mean memories of Mabon
all going to disappear?

rows.label: qst202022_msg0007
rows.name:
It is an inevitable part of the cycle.
Such is the fate of all Blades.

rows.label: qst202022_msg0010
rows.name:
If Hana and others still remember, we
have power to teach Musubi about past.

rows.label: qst202022_msg0011
rows.name:
Hana sure she will be more than
happy to rediscover old memories.

rows.label: qst202022_msg0013
rows.name:
Mabon only wanted the best for Musubi.
We have to do what we can to make
her happy.
